help.title: Help & FAQ
help.description: Answers to the most common questions when using the service.

fundingProcess.question: How does funding work?
fundingProcess.answer: Projects open → fans support → once the goal is reached we settle the payment and deliver rewards. You can rehearse the flow with Stripe test payments.

partnerReview.question: How long does partner review take?
partnerReview.answer: It takes 3–5 business days after submission and we will notify you via email.

settlementReport.question: Where can I find settlement reports?
settlementReport.answer: Go to the Settlement tab on the project detail page to access the reports.

brand.name: Collaborium
brand.description: A fan-made funding platform where artists and fans grow together.
